issues.description: Memory leak: delDoc reattaches a 'change' handler with CodeMirror.on instead of removing it. Should use CodeMirror.off.
Incorrect value stored in cachedArgHints. 'start' property receives an argument index ('pos') instead of the cursor position, causing cmpPos to operate on an invalid object.
Sorting changes uses cmpPos on whole change objects (cmpPos(b, a)) rather than their start positions, resulting in NaN comparisons and unpredictable rename behavior.
Loads multiple JavaScript files over plain HTTP, allowing man-in-the-middle modification of executed code.
